casebody.data:
Third Department,

September, 1940.

(September 11, 1940.) The People of the State of New York ex rel. Louis Barksdale, Appellant, v. Joseph H. Wilson, as Warden of Great Meadow Prison, Comstock, N. Y., Respondent.

Application to extend time in which to perfect appeal. Application granted and time within which to perfect appeal extended three months. Present — Hill, P. J., Crapser, Bliss, Schenck and Foster, JJ.
